original_title: Scout Association launches National Service, Relationship Month
original_body_lines: The National Service and Relationship Month organized by Sri Lanka Scout Association was launched recently at the Pedro Scout Camp in Nuwara Eliya under the patronage of President's Chief of Staff Sagala Ratnayake and Chief Scout.

Chief Commissioner Attorney at Law Mr. Janaprith Fernando invited Sagala Ratnayake to launch the National Scout Service and Relationship Month which is being held from 1st to 31 July. The Chief Guest observed the scouts from Nuwara Eliya engaging in the work and made the first contribution.
Major Gen. Suresh Sallay and the representatives of Sponsors of Job Cards Reckitt Benckiser Lanka Ltd. Kenneth Saluwadana, Area Sales Manager and R. Kuganeswaran, Field Sales Executive were present.
